quote: I guessed life was like that. You gained and you lost, and if you saved anything from the ruins, even if only a shred of self-respect, it was enough to take you through the next bit.
quote_letters: I GUESSED LIFE WAS LIKE THAT YOU GAINED AND YOU LOST AND IF YOU SAVED ANYTHING FROM THE RUINS EVEN IF ONLY A SHRED OF SELF-RESPECT IT WAS ENOUGH TO TAKE YOU THROUGH THE NEXT BIT
